        <script><![CDATA[/**
 * This business rule is used to prevent the update of the document template when
 * 1. The toc tag is added but no toc configuration is selected
 * 2. A toc configuration is selected but no macro is added
 * 3. Selected toc configuration requires page numbering but no page numbering configuration is chosen
 **/
(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
    var tocHelper = new global.TableOfContentsHelper();
    var templateBody = current.html_script_body;
    var isTagPresent = tocHelper.checkTOCTagPresence(templateBody);
    var isTocConfigSelected = !gs.nil(current.toc_config);
    var isPageNumberConfigRequired = isTocConfigSelected ? tocHelper.isPageNumberConfigRequired(current.toc_config) : false;

    var isValidationError = false;
    var documentsConfigAJAX = new global.DocumentsConfigAJAX();
    var isTOCandPageNumberConfigSupported = documentsConfigAJAX.isTOCandPageNumberConfigSupported();
    if (isTOCandPageNumberConfigSupported) {
        if (isTagPresent && !isTocConfigSelected) {
            isValidationError = true;
            gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage("Table of Contents has been inserted but Table of Contents configuration is not selected. Please select Table of Contents configuration."));
        } else if (!isTagPresent && isTocConfigSelected) {
            isValidationError = true;
            gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage("Table of Contents Configuration is selected but Table of Contents is not added to the document template. Please insert Table of Contents at the required position."));
        }

        if (isPageNumberConfigRequired && gs.nil(current.page_number_config)) {
            isValidationError = true;
            gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage("The selected Table of Contents Configuration requires Page Numbers, please choose a Page Number Configuration"));
        }

        if (isValidationError)
            current.setAbortAction(true);
    }
})(current, previous);]]></script>
